title: Gabor Kothay
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023131/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023131/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Gábor Kóthay**

Gábor Kóthay was born July 19th, 1962. He works as a graphic designer and teaches second-form art students. Typeface design was a hobby for many years but it has become an everyday routine with [Fontmunkások](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023131/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fontmunk%C3%A1sok) and [Fontana Type Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023131/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Fontana%20Type%20Foundry). He lives with his wife and two daughters in a suburb of Szeged, a sunny southern Hungarian town that lies on the banks of the Tisza river.

Typefaces by Gábor Kóthay: [Ambient](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023131/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/ambient.html), [Incognito](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023131/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=FOT0000074), [La Danse](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023131/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/ladanse.html), [SchwartzKopf](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023131/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/schwartz.html), [Zanzibar](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023131/http:/www.fountain.nu/catalogue/zanzibar.asp), [Zephyr](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809023131/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/zephyr.html)
author: paul d hunt
